Name: SnowBall FPS
About the game: SnowBall-FPS is a snowball fight game, multiplayer. Hide, attack, dig holes for cover, use stealth tactics, get upgrades, collect your snow reserves, or just find the nearest large slope and slide down it for fun with your mates. Some features: -Snow environment -Multiplayer (currently LAN) -Fun gameplay such as capture and defend flags, or stealth mode -Upgrades like invisible cloak, faster snowballs, bazooka mode, fast run, more -Slide down slopes for fun -Find heat / fires to restore health -Dig / collect snow to refill your snowball supply -Animated dance moves, eg for your victory.
